column1: The Purple Pig////Absolutely LOVED The Purple Pig. The milk braised pork shoulder was out of this world. Super tender
column2: nicely paired with buttery potato puree
column3: and topped with crispy capers. The white asparagus was tender and sweet on its own but  between the poached quail eggs
column6: held a different taste at every bite. The truffle and foie hotdog was a fun play on the Chicago style dog
column7: and if you're not a vegetable person... the broccoli will definitely change your mind.
